name: Fragments of Nusan
description:
A game im making , heavily inspired by "fragments of euclid"by NuSan.

It got a look of antichamber, or so i've been told.This was also the first time i worked with shaders or rather made shaders.Pretty fun to play around with, but hard to do right.

The game only got a few levels and still got a few visual bugs.I've also lost motivation to work on it ,but ill continue someday.
